description: Jadoo eats like a horse and has a stomachache on her picnic day. She goes to the bathroom behind the trees only to hear a clicking sound. She spots a classmate holding a camera in his hands! After realizing that her mother is secretly reading her diary, Jadoo tries to protect it.

titles.title: 좋으면 좋다고 말해 / 나의 프라이버시를 지켜줘
